body.name: TONOR UHF Dual Wireless Karaoke Microphones with Rechargeable Receiver - For Singing, DJ, Party
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Tomorrow, February 17. Order within 7 hrs 21 mins
features: High Quality Sound: The cardioid pickup pattern of this high-quality wireless mic significantly reduces unwanted background noise while focusing on the targeted sound source, resulting in an exceptional recording quality that exhibits minimal distortion and noise. Its dynamic mic with a cardioid pickup pattern provides additional benefits to ensure superior audio performance.

Wide Receiving Range: Enjoy a remarkable line-of-sight range of up to 200 feet with our cordless microphone and receiver, giving you the freedom to move around effortlessly both indoors and outdoors. Use it for a multitude of events, such as family karaoke, church gatherings, weddings, meetings, and presentations.

Plug and Play: With its 6.35mm wireless microphone jack, our receiver effortlessly connects to various devices such as karaoke machines, powered speakers, amplifiers, mixers, and audio interfaces. Please note that this system is not compatible with mobile phones, computers, or tablets.

15 Adjustable Channels: Our system provides effortless operation - simply turn it on, and the receiver will automatically synchronize with the transmitter's frequency. With 15 adjustable channels, you can eliminate radio interference, making it possible for up to 15 sets to be utilized simultaneously. Enjoy the convenience of effortless frequency synchronization and high-quality audio transmission at your numerous events and performances.

Long Working Time: Each microphone is powered by 2 AA batteries to ensure its long working time (AA Batteries NOT INCLUDED). The receiver with a 1500mAh built-in rechargeable battery for 5-6 hours of continuous use with just 2-3 hours of charging. Made of metal paint and ABS plastic, this microphone is lightweight and durable for on-the-go use. The display screen shows battery and signal strength for optimal performance.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Previous page Warm and Smooth Sound Our mic uses a 180° cardioid polar pattern to filter out ambient noise, producing realistic vocals. Plug & Play Turn on the receiver for automatic mic pairing and connect easily to your playback device for use. 15 Adjustable Frequencies 15 adjustable frequencies deliver uninterrupted, smooth sound without any disturbance. Rechargable Receiver With a 1500mAh built-in battery, no extra purchases are needed. Charging time is only 2-3 hours. Next page 1 Warm and Smooth Sound 2 Plug & Play 3 15 Adjustable Frequencies 4 Rechargable Receiver

How to adjust the volume of microphone? You can adjust the volume of the microphone by unscrewing the lower part of the tube body and using the square button. The button on the right side increases the volume, while the one on the left decreases it. Is it possible to replace the battery in the receiver if it's dead? Yes, you can replace the 18650 battery yourself by purchasing a replacement. Can I hook it up to my stereo for home karaoke? Yes, this microphone is indeed plug and play, which means that it can be used straight away without any complicated setup or additional software installations. Can it connect to any wireless speakers? Yes, the microphone can be used with any wireless speaker as long as the speaker has a compatible 6.35mm interface. I ordered 2 sets of microphones. Can I get all two mics to work on one receiver? No, a single receiver can only support one microphones at a time. Alternatively, our TW320 product can control two microphones with a single receiver.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 9, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars SOOO EASY to connect! Sound great! Made our lives easy and our performance was more professional.
reviews.reviewText: Our arts organization for adults with developmental differences had a giant Bluetooth speaker, but only had one corded microphone, and we had a big open house performance planned. I purchased these in hopes they would make everyone’s lives easier, and to be current and professional. My coworker and I expected to encounter frustration and perspiration as we attempted to connect these mics. But, within 5 seconds we had a successful amplified, “Hello? Hello? Oh wow! That was it?!” Our performance was hugely improved. They were used for 2 MCs, a karaoke song, and a staged radio play—they worked seamlessly. I was also really glad I purchased 2 mics and not just one. Well worth the investment for us!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 30, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great for karaoke
reviews.reviewText: I purchased for karaoke use, they both work great. I have used them several months now , no problems and easy to assemble.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 5, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Great microphone for the price
reviews.reviewText: Very sleek and nice pair of microphones, they work really well and the setup is really easy, just put the batteries connect the receptor to the speaker and voila! The sound is amazing and the Bluetooth connection is mostly reliable.My wife loves singing and now we find ourselves doing Karaoke 2-3 nights a week. I’m a bad singer but it captures you when you hear your voice.I honestly thought for the low price they were going to be cheap, but so far we had them for a couple of months and they are working great, excellent quality at an affordable price! I sure recommend them.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 21, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Awesome sound quality
reviews.reviewText: I am very impressed with the sound quality from these microphones. They pick up the voice really well and transmit it very cleanly. Using both the microphones at the same time results in a really fun experience when doing karaoke. The receiver base charge up and maybe 30 minutes. I haven't gotten a chance to really use it till the receiver base loses power so I couldn't really tell you what the max battery life is; however, we did use it for about 2 hours the other night and the receiver unit was still going strong. For the price, I believe this is the cheapest two microphone set on Amazon and you won't be disappointed in terms of quality. I highly recommend.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 27, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Elegant, high quality wireless microphones
reviews.reviewText: A very nice pair of high quality wireless microphones that work well with my home entertainment system for karaoke

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 26, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Good replacement for TW-630 we had
reviews.reviewText: It works good, sounds good. The only complaint is the power button on the microphone acting too fast. I wish it would act only after pushing down the button one second later, this one is instant on or off. That is too easy to turn on by accident during storage or transportation, also too easy for speaker touch that button and turned it off.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 6, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Nice Quality But......
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. I got a broken piece. Mic grip or anti slip piece

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 2, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Bought these to go with a party speaker that had a wired microphone. We started using it for karaoke with an iPad and these are perfect. We use them all New Year’s Eve weekend. The receiver is rechargeable, but each microphone takes AA batteries. I charge the receiver Friday and it lasted all weekend and we used it all weekend. Lol. Great price and decent karaoke mics!!!!
Works right out of the box with minimal setup. I used this with a JBL Partybox for Karaoke and it was awesome. Easy to use and good sound quality.
Very good quality! Sound is clear and no delays!
Sirven muy bien y se escucha fenomenal

reviews.reviewTitle: Duración de la batería del transmisor bluetooth
reviews.reviewText: El producto bastante bien en su funcionalidad y relación precio-calidadSolamente que la batería del transmisor de bluetooth con jack de 6.3, dura muy poco (alrededor de 2 a 3 horas) de tal manera que si estás en un evento de más tiempo, se cancela la utilidad de los micros inalámbricos. Si se tiene al alcance una extensión eléctrica y se conecta el cable cargador micro-usb, se alcanza a solucionar el problema
